actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase the amount of appropriations authorized for property acquisitions for the Colonial National Historical Park, in Yorktown, Va.

summary.text: Increases the amount of appropriations authorized for property acquisitions for the Colonial National Historical Park, in Yorktown, Virginia, from $2,777,000 to $2,867,000.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount of appropriations authorized for property acquisitions for the Colonial National Historical Park, in Yorktown, Va.
